title.rendered: Honor Vietnam Veterans, Celebrate Jewish-American Heritage Month and More During Live at the Library in May

content.rendered:
Honor Vietnam War veterans during Live at the Library in celebration of the 50th anniversary of the dedication of the Vietnam War Memorial on May 11. Cultural events in May also will celebrate Yiddish history in the United States and the history of recipes and cookbooks in America.

Click here for more information.

 

You are subscribed to Latest News from the Library of Congress.

You just read:

News Provided By

April 21, 2023, 15:24 GMT

for more information.



Originally published at https://www.einpresswire.com/article/629287206/latest-news-honor-vietnam-veterans-celebrate-jewish-american-heritage-month-and-more-during-live-at-the-library-in-may
